text: Hassan Gouled Aptidon (October 15, 1916 â€“ November 21, 2006) was a Djiboutian politician. He was the first President of Djibouti from 1977 to 1999."Djibouti: President Gouled Aptidon to retire in April after 22 years in power", AFP (nl.newsbank.com), 4 February 1999. He was also the 1st Prime Minister of Djibouti in 1977. Gouled Aptidon died at his home in Djibouti City on 21 November 2006 at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Presidents of Djibouti Category:Prime ministers of Djibouti
title: Hassan Gouled Aptidon
